page.title: 05A Day in the life of......
page.content: I wake up about seven o'clock I go down stairs have my breakfast which is usually Frosties and toast.Then I go upstairs have a wash and get dressed. My school uniform for winter is a grey skirt, white blouse a tie that is blue with silver stripes.My summer uniform is a blue and white check dress and blue cardigan.Then I pack my bag get my shoes on and go to school.When I get to Brixington Junior School I go in at 9.00.I am in Mr Holland's class with 29 other children aged 10.School Assembly is at 10.20.The rest of the day is spent working except for the lunch break which is from 12 to 1.15 when I eat my sandwiches. When I get home from school I get changed and practice my clarinet, then go out to play, but if I have got homework I have to stay in and do it. Then I have tea and watch TV until bedtime at 9.00
